name: A Broken World
description:
The objects are breaking physics when you react with them. What is going on?

Made for twist Jam 2020

Theme: Broken

Twist: Only allowed 3 Colors

Controls: WASD for movement. Left click to fix/break objects. Space to jump. Escape to quit the game.

Music credits: https://freesound.org/people/Erokia/sounds/399188/
